effect_entries.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.
effect_entries.short_effect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
The user gathers all
its light energy and
releases it at once.
It may also lower the
foe’s Sp. Def stat.

The user gathers all
its light energy and
releases it at once.
It may also lower the
foe’s Sp. Def stat.

The user gathers all
its light energy and
releases it at once.
It may also lower the
foe’s Sp. Def stat.

Le lanceur concentre son énergie
lumineuse et la fait exploser. Peut aussi
baisser la Défense Spéciale de l’ennemi.

The user gathers all its light energy and
releases it at once. It may also lower the
target’s Sp. Def stat.

The user gathers all its light energy and
releases it at once. It may also lower the
target’s Sp. Def stat.

からだの　ひかりを　いってんに　あつめて
ちからを　はなつ。あいての　とくぼうを
さげることが　ある。

몸의 빛을 한곳에 모아서
힘을 쏜다. 상대의
특수방어를 떨어뜨릴 때가 있다.

Le lanceur concentre son énergie lumineuse et
la fait exploser. Peut aussi baisser la Défense
Spéciale de l’ennemi.

Anwender sammelt Lichtenergie und feuert sie auf
einmal ab. Senkt eventuell Spezial-Verteidigung
des Zieles.

El usuario concentra toda la luz del cuerpo y la
libera. Puede bajar la Defensa Especial del
objetivo.

Chi la usa attacca raccogliendo e rilasciando
energia luminosa. Può ridurre la Difesa Speciale
del nemico.

The user gathers all its light energy and
releases it at once. This may also lower the
target’s Sp. Def stat.

体の　光を　一点に　集めて
力を　放つ。
相手の　特防を　さげることが　ある。

からだの　ひかりを　いってんに　あつめて
ちからを　はなつ。あいての　とくぼうを
さげることが　ある。

將身體的光芒
聚集在一個點後釋放出去。
有時會降低對手的特防。
